title: Search Tools: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Supplement your primary source research using the Libraries' databases and subject specific research guides. The McCormick Library of Special Collections and University Archives' collection includes manuscripts, University records, prints, broadsides, photographs, ephemera, multimedia, faculty publications and more. The majority of collections are cataloged in NUsearch, but some are discoverable only through other Northwestern University search tools. Use the following search tools to locate materials in Northwestern Libraries' collection, as well as content that has been digitized and made available online. If you cannot find what you're looking for, contact a library staff member for assistance. Call 847-491-3635 or email specialcollections@northwestern.edu
